Articles.Content:
Just over a year of KSP,Just over a thousand posts,and a thousand hours of game-time(recorded).Lets see what we've done.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

In order of appearence.We...

-Landed on the Mun

-launched a space station in one go.

-Began a journey out of kerbol.

-had an embarrassing first encounter with Duna.

-Landed on Ike twice.

-Built a boring lander for Minmus.

-Blatantly ripped off chickenkeepers Vall rover.

-Landed on Vall.

-trapped many kerbals on Duna.

-Began traveling the system.

-Improved on chickenkeepers Vall rover.

-Planted a flag on Tylo first.

-Still didn't escape yet.

-Made another station.

-Discovered a bug/easter egg(still not sure)

-Rescued 6 kerbals from Duna Apollo style.

-Killed them all accidentally(still happens don't fall over at KSC)

-Still haven't escaped yet.

-Constructed a third Minmus base.

-Played chicken with the Mun in a Mini space station.

-No idea.

-Landed a first rover on the Mun.

-Landed a rollver on Pol.

-Went on extreme EVA.

-Landed as high up as possible.

-Explored the Moholes.

-Started building a forth Minmus base.

-Watched the forth Minmus base destroy itself.

-Scanned every world.

-Experimented with hybrid rovers.

-Decided to leave Vall.

-Destroyed the sun using the probe from the second picture

-Started a new save.

-Landed with an identical lander shortly after.

-Created a Duna base.

-Became militant for some time.

-Kuriositied.

-Landed a carrier.

-Got in a war over Ike.

-Got ready for a grand tour.

-.22 came out.

-Circumnavigated Eeloo

-Climbed the second highest mountain west of KSC.

-Circumnavigated eve in a Jet.

-Created an exploration in a box for any world.

-Became militant again.

-Landed on Duna for the umpteenth time.

-Got a beautiful render from rareden.

And all the other things which weren't pictured...

Thank you squad for over a year of endless entertainment and thank you for constant additions.Here's to another 1000/365/1000.

Extras:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/entries/992-probe-teK-defence-division
Enjoyed the album and congrats on the milestones.

Congrats on all the achievements! Not everyone sticks in the game long enough to reach 1000 everything!

Also some amazing shots in the album!

I just landed "something" on eve the other day for the first time I've been playing for almost a year haha.

Before that, the best I'd done is orbited it.

I say "something", because that "something" is now a neat little pile of debris. It still transmitted science, though!

It landed nice, but tipped over, it was slightly too tall.

I've also very recently aquired the rocket building (and landing) expertise to return kerbals from both Mun and Minimus (which I'd never really been all too good at before)

Nice album, though, lots of nice pictures!
Wow. That's a lot of ships o.o
